content: you are very welcome to join our growing facebook community share project photos and connect with other crocheters in a positive and encouraging environment click here 1 looking for a quick crochet stash buster project i ve got you covered use any yarn that is worsted weight or higher and pair it with a complimenting hook size to whip up a speedy little basket perfect for your desk nightstand inside a drawer or an entry way table it s easy peasy and super cute gauge is not important for this pattern this yarn works best with worsted weight yarn or higher the thicker the yarn the larger your basket will be use any hook that compliments your yarn choice **inside the paid pattern you will find ** - detailed written instructions - clear photos - simple written format with helpful photos - required tools approximate yardage required **materials needed** - approximate amounts are worsted weight 8-9 yards bulky weight 15-16 yards super bulky 16-17 yards - an appropriate sized hook to match your yarn weight i used 5mm for worsted 6mm for bulky and 8mm for super bulky - yarn needl - stitch marker if you would like to keep track of the first stitch of each round - scissors *this pattern has been tested so you can feel confident in your purchase please note this is a digital file and not a finished product there will be no refunds on digital products * please consider sharing a photo of your beautiful work snap a picture of your finished piece and add it to your ravelry projects or post it to instagram and give me a tag @sweet_bee_crochet i d love to see happy crocheting 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet
